title: banned
body:
yo riot please unbanned mt account i got mad one game and a little salty because i had negative players on my team, just being negative from the start of the game, i used to flame a lot but I've stopped and I've spent of 2k on this game if you ban my account perm i lose repeat for your company is there anything i can do. this is unfair considering people pay so much on this game and allow accounts to get perm banned, seriously this is really fucking unfair like really heart my heart sincerely league player, just perma banned people in chat?
wouldn't that a be smart just never let people chat period problem solved don't allow them to see chat non of that
then no one would trash talk. seriously riot 2k on this game and y'all just gunna throw my account away
smh

replies.body:
Riot "Thanks for your money chump, now gtfo"

And people keep spending money on this game.

It really sucks that you were the one that ended up getting the ban, but remember that it's never good to fight fire with fire. It also looks like you've had several warnings in the past which eventually led up to this ban. Those warnings are meant to give you time to think about what might have happened that led to the punishment. 

If you're playing on a different account in the future, remember that the best way to deal with those types of people is to simply report them for the behavior. That way they're the one with punishments and not yourself!

I won't be okay in a different account this shit hurts my heart I've spent so much time love and money in this game and I've learned so much from it which  is crazy, why perma ban people, just perma ban them in chat, I've changed a lot from my previous games, look at my chat log, I encourage people to do better, and I defend people that are getting crap in game for not doing so well, this isn't fair, like I said if you guys want to permanently band my account atleast give me my money, show me that you guys care about your people, I'm never playing league again nor will I ever spend another penny on it. Over athousnd riot, over 1k. You guys shouldn't allow perma bans I sent you guys a message as well I've changed a lot in my mid set of league this is sad, figure something out riot. Why not just permantly ban chat? Ristrict that from me take it away from people. Don't let them chat or see chat. They can still communicate well using pings. As pings are already a big part of communication as well, as I've gone games not saying a word but using pings, like I said I've changed a lot I've gotten better at league and way way way, better with my attitude. Don't do this to me or other out there in my position as. One being dunkey, he was i think one away from challenger or something like that and some one in his game was trolling and he got a little toxic, you guys took away from him a lot, dunkey is one of the main reason I started to play and love league, you guys should figure out a way or a system because I have so much love for your game and I don't want to make a new account as it will never be the same :( sorry but riot you can't expect every one to be a dandy lion as every has that little bit of heat in them, make a system please don't ruin my love for this as this really helps put my mind away from personal shit that goes on in my life, kind of like my drug, people get fucked up to forget, I just play league lmfaooo be on a serious not, I hope you guys see where I'm coming from, sincerialy itamate ex league player
Ps - there are huge time gaps where I've stopped playing for a while look at the time gaps as well

Even though you spent time and money on your account, you are responsible for what you say in the game, and in the end you don't actually own your account or any of the skins and stuff you bought, what you bought was the right to use them on that account. Riot Games has every right to do with your account as they see fit. Could it feel unfair? Yes.   Is it unfair? No. They set the rules that you accepted to when you signed up for the game and accept every patch as well. You broke those rules and were punished accordingly.
Sorry man.
Dam might as well {{summoner:6}} my ass back to spawn{{item:1001}} *gotta BLAST*

Dude go look at my chat logs from all my past games like j said big time gap that I took breaks I've changed a lot! Like a lot dude I encourage people that are doing not so well I also defend them from other flamers I also inform people that flaming won't do shit, I promise I've changed a lot
Kill them with kindness. Agree with everything they say (whether you really do or don't) or just type smiley faces and tilt them off the Rift.
You've gotten warnings, and you didn't reform. People always claim that they'll change once their account gets permabanned. You shouldn't have gotten to that point anyways.

Then if they don't give a fuck you my as well give me my money back, pretty much saying fuck you we don't care. How are you just going to banned my account with all that money spent, give the money back cause that's messed up
